modName: Four new taller horses for different player types
summary: I made this mod bacause there are different player types like assassins, warriors and hunters and I wanted to make horses who fit.
descriptionHtml:
!!!Enhanced Horse Skins by Shogun3d is needed if you want the white or new grey skin. If you don't have this mod the horses will have vanilla skins for example the white one will be palomino. LINK: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/596/? !!!
------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Location: All four horses are located at the Whiterun Stables and are free to ride.

About the horses:
-Gallahad: He's my favorite. He's tall and pretty and perfect for warriors or kind of decadent players ;). He's the white one/palomino. He's the second fastest.
-Missandre: She's perfect for kind of normal players. She's the grey one and not that tall. She's the third fastest.
-Staadnau: She's pefect for nature friends or hunters because she has no saddle (I love this detail). She's the smalest and slowest but though faster and taller than normal horses. She's the brown one.
-Dante: He's probably the most badass horse of all. He's the Shadowmere skinned. "But why not using Shadowmere instead?" BEEECAUSE Dante is faster, much taller (what makes him look even more badass and demonic) and you don't have to finish any questline. He's the fastest of all and it's great fun to ride him.

Enjoy! :3
author: LadyMassaca
